name: 李率熙
awards: 2023年 第44届韩国电影青龙奖 最佳新人导演 (提名) 塑料大棚
introduction: Lee Sol-hui was born in Seoul in 1994 and graduated from the Department of Film, Television and Multimedia, Sungkyunkwan University, before majoring in directing at the Korean Academy of Film Arts. She directed short films including The End of That Summer (2017) and Look-alike (2020). Her graduation work at the Korean Academy of Film Arts, Anthill (2021), was introduced at the Wide Angle: Korean Short Film Competition in Busan International Film Festival. Greenhouse is her first feature film.
